page.title: 04KILBURN(DERBY)AREA HOME LIFE
page.content: The majority of homes in our area are ocupied by families, most with children and some with only one parent. In a high proportion of families, other members of the extended family live within half_an_hours drive, many within a few minutes walk. Most home_life is dominated by three things; food, clothing and entertainment. Mothers, in particula, spend much time buying, preparing, and cooking food. The washing, ironing and repair of clothes, and in a large minority of homes, their making, also takes up time, particualy as the young are increasingly choosy & fashion conscious. Entertainment is dominated by the television and the latest invention, videos, for use with these.
